explains: n. 温度计，寒暑表，体温计
wordGroup: infrared thermometer 红外测温仪；红外线温度计
digital thermometer 数字（式）温度计
clinical thermometer 体温计，体温表
bimetallic thermometer 双金属温度计

sentences.en: It is essential that you are able to read a thermometer.
sentences.cn: 能读出温度计上的温度是基本要求。

sentences.en: The thermometer shows the temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit.
sentences.cn: 温度计显示摄氏温度和华氏温度。
